BitmapLayerTreeOwner

The BitmapLayerTreeOwner class holds a layer tree and allows the rendering results to be obtained as a Bitmap class. (Since 1.1.0)
By passing this as the first argument to the Layer class constructor instead of a window, the rendering results of those Layers can be obtained as an image in a Bitmap class.
